value: So Rayane and Vinny were getting ready to leave the cave. The path is a long way across an open field surrounded by forests all around. A tremendous smoke could be seen in a long distance coming from a village a little far away. Some forests around were on fire, and smoke from explosions could be seen all around. Vinny was very surprised by everything he was seeing.
Wooow... O-okay, wherever you go, I'll go too. If you go to hell I will too!
Vinny then started following Rayane. During the progress Vinny tried to fight his worry. When Rayane noticed Vinny's behavior, Rayane looked a little worried at Vinny.
Vinny... Remember that this is not training. If someone attacks you, nobody won't pity you the way I did. Alright? We just need to check out the village.
Rayane starts to enter the forest slowly, following the trail of smoke. Vinny tried to remain confident.

Ye-yes. This time I don't have my little pot with sand or dirt, but I have my wings and I know how to fly. You can be calm about me. I know how to take care of myself in more delicate situations like this.
Rayane gets a little more worried when she thought about Vinny's actions.
Everyone here can have one sword or firearms. Please, be really careful.

Rayane gets a little more worried while using magic to wear herself the protective armor. Vinny was a little surprised to see Rayane's armor. But then Rayane looked into Vinny's eyes, feeling a little guilty.
N-no no... He really won't just follow me around if I try to take the safest path. If I try to change his trajectory, he'll find out.
Vi-vinny. I-I can't see you like this. You really need armor. But I only have one unicorn armor left. You won't be able to use your wings when you're wearing the armor.
Vinny was curious about Rayane's change in behavior.
What? Won't that bother you? Do you think it's safer for me to wear the unicorn armor?

Shhh, don't worry. It's my old armor that I used during my life before I got my current armor as a gift. Please take good care of this armor and stay safe. I don't want to see you being ripped in half.
Vinny gets a little scared, but Rayane felt calmer when she used magic to start spawning the ancient armor on Vinny's Body kindly.
O-oh wow. Thanks Rayane.
Vinny smiled and hugged Rayane gently in response when he felt safer by the armor.
All right then! I am going to follow you.
Rayane smiled a little more while hugging back. Rayane was feeling better and more comfortable seeing Vinny feel safe.
Take good care of the armor~ When we find a store, we'll buy a backpack similar to James's backpack. Then you will have less problems with weight on your back.
Heh! Yes charming Rayane.

Rayane does a little giggles then slowly resumed walking to give Vinny time to get back into the rhythm of the adventure. Meanwhile, high above the clouds was Rainbow Queen and the mysterious unicorn. The mysterious unicorn was wearing a special boot for her hooves to stay on top of the clouds. Rainbow Queen seemed to be watching all the conflict that was going on in the mysterious village. Rainbow Queen's gaze was very serious, she didn't seem to be satisfied with what was happening.
War never changes. War is such a ridiculous thing. Are you seeing this? Two ponies trying to be heroes, such a ridiculous and absurd fantasy. Hiroshi will not have the mental balance for this war.
The mysterious unicorn would get a little scared.
Bu-but he said this time he was going to try something better. And the Elite Color was going to try to control the balance of the war.
Rainbow Queen then looked at the mysterious unicorn and made a sinister laugh.
What? Elite Color? Do you still trust the Elite Color?
Rainbow Queen then looked at the mysterious unicorn and made a sinister laugh. The mysterious unicorn then became a little more insecure and tried to respond in a more determined way.

Ye-yes. Elite Color has always been something very important to all of us! This dimension urgently needs to expand the energy! Our dimension will become a real strong dimension! Isn't that what you want?

Rainbow Queen took a deep breath and responded disappointedly. Rainbow Queen looked a little angry as she started to respond. The mysterious unicorn then walks backwards when realizing Rainbow Queen's anger.
We don't need to kill many ponies to get souls to sustain this dimension. And a war was the worst choice you all ever made.
The mysterious unicorn slowly gets a little more intimidated as she saw the Rainbow Queen's sinister gaze from the hatred.
So-sorry. I know you have empathy for souls. I'm sorry!
When this war is over, I'm going to want to have a very private conversation with Hiroshi and Marlon. I hope Marlon doesn't get scared when he sees a divinity for the first time.
The mysterious unicorn gets very surprised for a few seconds.
Y..Really? Are you really going to do this? You've always said that it's dangerous for normal ponies to discover the identity of gods.

Rainbow Queen did a sinister little smirk before replying while the scythe poked the mysterious unicorn's neck gently for a few seconds. The mysterious unicorn then "froze", just shyly looking into the Rainbow Queen's eyes.

Shhhh~ Do you really think everyone in this world will believe that someone has seen a goddess? This world still needs more maturity to understand the existence of gods. We don't want the same mistakes to happen again.
Ye-yes. This is true. Th-the true.
Good~ Very good~ Then you are free again. You can go back to your "fun".
Rainbow Queen then looked at the village again for a few seconds. Rainbow Queen looked very thoughtful about what was really going on.
Just don't forget. You still have a chance to do something better.
Rainbow Queen then looked at the village again for a few seconds. Rainbow Queen looked very thoughtful about what was really going on.
Meanwhile, Rayane and Vinny is walking through the forest. So Rayane would stop for a while to look carefully around if there was no one around.
Okay. I need to trust you that no one will show up while I use my magic again just like other time when we left the cave. Okay?
Vinny was a little surprised to remember the moment where Rayane was using this ability.
W-what? Do you want me to keep looking around?
Yes. I'm vulnerable when I'm using this spell, will you help me look around. If something happens, let me know and I'll react.
Rayane came back into concentration to perform the mysterious magic again. Then Rayane's mane would slightly start to swing during the progress.
O-okay.

Vinny worried, but he worked hard to stay focused. Rayane was very focused on Vinny's reactions as a warning reference. But Vinny didn't realize that. So Vinny heard the noise of hooves moving around. Vinny and Rayane liten to the very small sound of someone groaning in pain. Vinny start to talk very quietly so as not to distract Rayane.
Yeah. I can hear someone groaning in pain.
Rayane was still concentrating on magic and was slowly finishing magic progress when she heard Vinny's voice. Vinny could just see a leaf finishing doing some movement that maybe could be suspicious.
Oh no. This is not good.
Shhhh... Looks like there are some ponies around. But I don't know if the ponies are allies or enemies.
Rayane gets a little worried as she concentrated on looking around.
Y-yeah. I had a slight feeling that someone is here. Maybe this is a trap.
Yes yes. We must already be inside some possible trap. Don't worry about it.
Rayane replies as she started to spawn the sword. Vinny's eyes widen in surprise as he realizes the situation is getting serious.
Oh shit.
Fine.

Vinny was feeling nervous, but watched around waiting for something. Vinny and Rayane didn't see anything. Just hear the sound of some body being left on the ground. Rayane looked a little intimidating to try to show that she was focused on the danger.
O-okay. I felt someone moving there.

Vinny points toward the place where he had the sensation of someone moving. It was a place with a lot of tree leaf, making it difficult to see the place. Rayane laughed a little while her horn glowed a little stronger, making her sword go up in flames as she prepares the attack.
Yes. But this is not the only place. But good tip for us to start the fun~ Use your wings to throw my fire around. Alright?
Vinny was a little surprised and just moved his face in agreement.
Ok ok.
Vinny took off his armor a little, just so the wings were free and prepared to fan in order to help Rayane's plan.
Ok. it's now.

The sword rotated forward, throwing some of the fire's combustion towards the trees. Vinny was a little more surprised, and reacted without a second thought. Vinny leaned over and started flapping his wings enough until he realized that the fire generated by Rayane was taking the path. Then when the fire reached the place. Suddenly more trees was wiggling, revealing a surprise attack from all directions made by arrows.
Get down now!
WHAT THE FUCK IS THAT?!
Then Rayane pulled Vinny to the ground while the sword start to spin violently, making the sword change the direction of rotation to horizontal, hitting the arrows in sequence.
WHAT A CRAZY SWORD!

Vinny rolls a little. So Vinny gets up and starts to beat his wings with a little more intensity. The fire began to expand in a circular shape in the form of a ring, starting to catch fire in the other trees around, making whoever was there start to move away.
Yeah! You're doing well! We need to have a plan to react now!
Let's take advantage of them moving away. I'll fly up and you prepare a teleport in my direction.
Vinny looks at the armor during some seconds.
I won't need the armor for now. Everypony here probably have firearms.
Vi-vinny? Be careful! You are an easy target while flying up.
Rayane was a little worried and then stopped spinning her sword. Rayane was very focused, starting to charge the teleport. Vinny waited for the fire to disappear before start to fly up.
Don't worry. I trust you!

Vinny flies up getting ready to fly forward in order to follow the plan to surprise the ponies that were in the front. Vinny could escape the situation. And everyone hardly noticed his attempt to escape. Then at the same time Vinny landed, Rayane appeared next to Vinny, helping Vinny put the armor back on.
Wow! It really worked!
Rayane feels satisfied with the result, did not think twice and made the sword go up in flames again, preparing to do the first action that comes to mind.
Yeah! Block the way with your sword! You can make a fire barrier!
Barrier? Heh, good idea~
Rayane used the fire sword to rip the earth floor, making all the trees that were close start to catch fire.
Let's get out of here Vinny! We'll have time to run away now!
Rayane quickly started to run very fast in a straight line.
AAH!

Vinny followed Rayane, trying hard to keep the same speed as Rayane. Suddenly a unicorn sniper pony that was behind a tree tried to shoot Vinny, the shot passed grazing Vinny a lot, and at the same time Rayane used the sword and cut the sniper barrel, surprising the sniper. Vinny was a little scared, but he tried to laugh at the danger to calm himself down.
W-WOOOW!! IIIHAAAAAAA! YOU NEED TO IMPROVE THAT SIGHT YOU BLIND!!!
W-WHAT?! RAYANE?! AH! FUUUCK!
The sniper fall to the ground and end up. The pony stayed behind and disappeared over the horizon.
Heh. Your head was nearly blown off. Are we going to hide or enter the village by force?
Let's hide! if we go through this, James and Jeff will too, let's hide somewhere and make a better plan than going out screaming!
Rayane was a little curious and laughed a little and answered.
Okay. I'll have to do this on the hard way. Get on my back and hold on tight!
Vinny looks at Rayane for a few seconds, laughing a little.
Okay.
Vinny climbs on Rayane's back.
That's not how I wanted to climb on you for the first time but I trust you!
Heh. Be careful not to fall~
Rayane increased her speed in a much more extreme way and used the trees as platforms to parkur on the trees.
WOOOW!
When Rayane got to the top of the trees, Vinny accidentally fell off her, so Vinny had some chance of trying to hold on to the tree slacks during the progress
RAAAYANE!
Vinny holds the branch, doing a POKER FACE. Vinny soon felt a magic levitating his up, Rayane was balancing on the top of the tree, trying to bring Vinny back towards her.
Sorry Vinny. Let's get out of here!
Aah... Don't worry, it's dangerous for us to stop here. I'll fly to the village. You can try to find me.
Vinny stepped onto the top of the tree and got off Rayane's back slowly. Rayane gets worried during the talk.
Fly? Don't fly too high or everyone will see you. If something happens, shout it out loud. Okay?
It's going to be okay, charming Rayane.
Rayane just smiles a little, trying to trust Vinny. So Rayane went back to parkur between the trees towards the village.

Vinny smiles and flies up. Vinny flew at high speed, trying to keep a good distance away from being noticed. Vinny started to see some other pegasu flying in the sky towards the village, it looked like the pegasus was holding something medium sized black on his back. Vinny tried not to get too close to the pegasus, Vinny just stared at the pegasus for a few seconds.
W-what? Is this another bomb?

Vinny could see the smoke from the previous confusion. Then Vinny would hear a sound of ponies entering the forest. And at the same time Vinny also hear the sound of something falling from the sky. It looked like the mysterious pegasus had hurled the mysterious black object. Vinny tried to get a better look at what it was. So Vinny realized that yes, the item is a bomb.
OH MY GOD! OH FUCK! OOH FUCK! NOO!

Vinny came down from the tree but being careful to the ground and tried to look more at the crowd. Vinny saw several ponies that were running desperately. Vinny saw a few more soldier ponies familiar with the ones Vinny saw during the trap, but the soldiers weren't even caring about Vinny anymore. Vinny saw something that looked like Rayane towards the wall.
OH NO NO NO! RAYANE!!! SHIT! RAYANE!! I NEED YOU!
Vinny flies toward Rayane desperately, but Vinny felt a magic pulling his quickly to the side of the wall.
Vinny! This is good see you again! What is happening?! I heard ponies screaming that the village is going to be completely destroyed!
Rayane looks scared by the situation, trying to understand what is happening. Vinny gets nervous as he began to respond.

Ma-maybe the black bomb I saw falling from the sky is something? I saw black bomb falling in the middle of the city. Please, look for a military or someone you think is involved in the invasion. We'll force this pony to talk about the bomb.
Bomb?! Are you crazy?! My teleport takes seconds to charge! This is madness! You don't know the destructive power of this bomb!
Calm down! Calm down! Rayane, I can fly to the bomb and look myself. I'll be fine.
How do you say that if you haven't finished your first training?! VINNY! NOOOOO!

Vinny flies over the wall. Vinny kept a high speed to try to reach the bomb as fast as possible. Vinny saw the bomb entering the center of the village. Vinny realized that all the destruction was more focused on the center of the village than all the rest of the village. Vinny was getting tired very fast from flying so fast, but Vinny was very dedicated to trying to use as few seconds as possible.
Come on! It's going to be easy! Imagine that we are playing CS! Come on Vinny!

Vinny were feeling more and more tired. The center of the village was very much destroyed with a huge crater in the ground. The bomb was about to land in the center of the crater. Vinny then saw the bomb. The place was extremely insulated due to evacuation.
WOW! OK I understand. This explains a lot of the noises I heard in the cave.
Vinny landed next to the bomb and try to analyze the stuff. The bomb was starting to pierce the ground. Vinny was desperate to see that the bomb was starting to disappear into the ground.
What the fuck is that?! No! COME BACK HERE!
Vinny tried in various ways to stop the bomb process. As the bomb sank deeper and deeper into the ground, Vinny thought about using the pickaxe piece, but couldn't find time to come up with a plan.
FUCK FUCK! FUUUUCK! I'm FUCKED! AH!
Vinny flies up and start screaming loudly for help.
IS ANYONE HERE?!?! THIS PLACE IS GOING TO EXPLODE!! I CAN TAKE YOU OUT OF HERE!!!

Vinny accidentally finds Rayane running in the middle of the village, looking for something. Vinny see lots of pony bodies lying on the ground and some gun remains lying around, but Vinny couldn't be sure if the guns could be working or not. Vinny was scared and worried for a few seconds.
O-oh god. This looks a lot worse than I imagined. Ra-rayane? Holy crap! Rayane!
Vinny start to fly towards Rayane in an extremely desperate way.
RAAAYANE! The time is almost zero! if you have something it's now! The bomb already started digging down! if you have any plans it's now or never!
NO! Calm down! I had a plan ready! Let's use the plan now!
Rayane showed a a mysterious military pegasus. The pegasus was desperate and tired.
Wow! You are really quick at your task.

Rayane invaded a basement door of a random house and entered this quickly. Vinny without a second thought, helped carry the mysterious pegasus while following Rayane. Vinny was extremely scared and regretful.
Rayane! You can use your teleport. So-sorry. No matter what happens, it's my fault. I brought you here. Do your best!
Rayane took a deep breath, trying to keep calm, and just gave a slight serious look.
Please Vinny. This is no time to be sorry. Pray for everything to be on time. I'm trying to make your plan work.
Ye-yes... yes. So-sorry Rayane.
Vinny was very worried and kept quiet. Vinny tried to keep all his hopes on Rayane. Rayane was very dedicated to keeping her focus on magic as much as possible during the progress.
Sssssh~
AH! AAAAH!

Then suddenly all the sound around was interrupted by an extremely deafening explosion sound. Everything around was extremely bright, Vinny was trying to maintain consciousness while Rayane tried to protect him, but Vinny passed out in the process.
Ra-rayane? Hello? Rayane?

Vinny's ears were ringing very loudly. It looked like Vinny's hearing was finally starting to recover the ringing as he woke up. The flash was calming down, Vinny was on the ground next to many burnt objects around.
Hello? Ra-rayane? Somebody?
Vinny was very scared, worried, trying to look for Rayane and the pegasus. A few minutes passed, but Vinny finally found Rayane, she was alive, but extremely weak.
N-nooo! Ra-rayane? RAYANE!

Vinny realized that Rayane tried to combine teleport magic at the last minute along with the force field. Rayane's horn was very damaged from the process. Next to Rayane was the mysterious pegasus that was still alive, but also passed out. Vinny vision was returning back more and more.
Hey, Rayane? Rayane, are you okay?

Vinny hugged Rayane gently, trying to wake her up. Vinny was very worried that Rayane was slowly losing more energy and Rayane's smartmoby was starting to fail. But Vinny smiled when he saw that Rayane's eyes were moving.
Vi-vinny? I-I'm fine. It's great to see you again.
Rayane starts to cought, trying not to breathe too much smoke from the explosion.
I-I had to use a lot of magic. I just need to rest.
Rayane tries to keep eyes open due to extreme tiredness while hugging Vinny back slowly. Vinny then helped Rayane to slowly close her eyes.
Ra-rayane. Don't worry, you can rest here, I'll take care of you and the other one here. Stay here while I go check out what happened. Okay?

Rayane smiled a little and just accepted to keep her eyes closed and fainted again slowly. Vinny put Rayane on the bed delicately. So Vinny looked around trying to know where he was. Vinny see a huge smoke blocking the sunlight. Everything looked darker and it was very windy. But Vinny realized that his were close to the village wall which was well damaged from the explosion. Vinny gets extremely surprised and very curious as he looked around again.
Bu-but how did I survive it? What really happened here?
Then Vinny would go back to the basement of the house. Vinny take the spray and use this on Rayane horn slowly. Vinny was still worried about Rayane. But Vinny tried to keep hopeful.
Ra-rayane. It's gonna be okay. I promise.

Vinny wear the miner helmet and got up slowly, looking around again while breathing deeply, trying to find some new shelter. Vinny would only find many houses without roofs or with half roofs. So Vinny starts to see a extremely deeper new crater on the village center.
W-what? It's the same crater. Was this all an excavation?
Vinny went back to the basement and look for some rags, clothes, or anything to hold the mysterious pegasus. Then Vinny smiled as he looked at an abandoned wardrobe, then he opened the wardrobe.
That was good luck.
Vinny could only find cloths of possible clothes and some pieces of some firearm.
Hoho!

Vinny picked up all the rags possible and the rest of the weapon, but focused on the rags. Then Vinny would go back to where the mysterious pegasus was. The mysterious pegasus was still unconscious. Vinny ties up the pegasus to make sure it doesn't escape.
Okay. I think that's enough for him not to hurt Rayane.

Vinny walked over metal pieces, wood scraps, and other burnt materials on the floor. Vinny finally came back to the surface again and looked up at the sky. Now the sky was a little more visible, and Vinny could see that there were still some fireballs that had flown into the sky, falling over some parts closer to the center of the village.
Oh god...

Vinny walked a little further through the destroyed village area. Vinny watched the dead bodies on the floor, trying to find any usable items. During each walk, Vinny felt uncomfortable seeing each dead body. Many of these bodies were slowly disintegrating. Vinny saw that instead of blood, the bodies had pixels coming out of the bodies.
Wow! If this was supposed to be some censorship, it's just getting more bizarre.

After a few minutes, Vinny was in a place where there were few houses, as many houses were completely destroyed by the explosion. Vinny picked up as many clothes as possible from the corpses and made sure there wasn't any melee weapon nearby like a knife or a spear.
This place is very depressing. Where are all the survivors?

Vinny then decided to go back to the basement where Rayane was, and during the progress, Vinny saw some mysterious shadow of a possible pegasus in the place, but the mysterious new pony was head down and sad. Vinny was completely surprised and curious. And he slowly watched the situation.
O-Oh fuck! I just opened my mouth! Who is this time?
Vinny then walked slowly towards the shadow, Vinny heard a female voice crying and lamenting a lot. This voice seemed to be sad, but very full of hatred for something.
N-no... it's not possible. These two ponies are annoying! They just make wars!
Wait. This voice. That voice is very familiar.

Vinny had a slight strange sensation of feeling a small cold wind coming from the directions of the dead bodies on the ground. It seemed to be some energy, but unfortunately Vinny could only feel this, Vinny couldn't see this.
Oh? Th-that feeling. This is getting a little scary. But I think I'm getting what's going on here.

Vinny was a little scared, and just kept walking towards the voice. Vinny tries to see if Rayane was okay during the progress. Vinny walked carefully, very curious when he started to feel a light coming from the basement.
O-oh no.

Vinny left clothes and knives outside before entering the basement slowly. Vinny could see a little more of the shadow forming in an alicorn shape. The shadow was very familiar. Then Vinny realizes it's Rainbow Queen. Rainbow Queen was trying to do something with Rayane.
W-what?! You again! Who are you?!
Shhhhhhh~ Calm down Rayane. I didn't expect to find you here. I promise to take revenge on whoever did all this to you.
Rainbow Queen seemed to be crying a little and at the same time doing an extremely strong dark aura in the place.
N-no! Wait! Rayane and I were trying to defuse the bomb!
Vinny walks backwards slowly without making any suspicious moves.
What?

Rainbow Queen looked very serious and looked back, trying to preserve her identity through the glow of her body. But when Rainbow Queen recognized Vinny voice a little, she tried to make some contact.
Y-yeah! I was with Rayane during the whole time. Rayane is very tired because she tried to protect me during the explosion.
Rainbow Queen looked towards him slowly, looking into Vinny eyes. Vinny see two rainbow glow eyes. Rainbow Queen was starting to suspect something.
You? The energy of your smartmoby is familiar. What are you doing here?
Vinny saw that the Rainbow Queen face started to form tattoos on her face during the progress.

A-ah. We were here protecting ourselves from the explosion. We caught someone involved in this attack, he's passed out. I don't want to do anything with you, I wanted to stay close to Rayane until she wakes up. I've been with Rayane for a long time and I've never done her any harm, you have to believe me. We can talk about it if you want. What can I do to make you believe in me?
Rainbow Queen was staring at Vinny, looking like she was analyzing something during some seconds. Rainbow Queen was even more suspicious of Vinny's presence.

Hmm... So you claim to be her friend? And you still want to dare me to believe you? You have a lot of courage. Challange me will be the worst thing you'll ever do in your life. Simple words won't be enough to convince someone like me.

Vinny was very surprised to see Rainbow Queen's body filled with brightly colored elements, her egyptian looks, her accessories. But what I most made Vinny's surprised is that Rainbow Queen didn't have a smartmoby on her arm.
Doesn't she have this weird thing on her arm? What does that mean?
I-I can prove this! I have pictures of her smiling with me. It never crossed my mind to challenge you, I don't even want to think about it.
Vinny was a little worried for a few seconds, but he didn't give up trying to stay determined.
I-I just want her to be okay, I can show you the pictures of us or you can wait for her to wake up.
Rainbow Queen showed an expression of more suspicion before making a small sinister laugh.
Photographs? You are so innocent. This means that you have privileged technology in this dimension. Photographs are not common in this dimension.
Rainbow Queen looked very deeply into Vinny eyes, wanting to watch Vinny senses to try to see if Vinny were telling the truth in a very intimidating way.
It seems that you are hiding something from me. How am I supposed to trust that you have not manipulated these images?
Vinny was surprised and anxious during the conversation. Vinny tried to calm down a bit before continuing the conversation.
If you don't believe in me, that's fine, Rayane has this picture in an album. She seems to have a lot of love and extreme affection in her photo album.
Vinny calmed down a little more, breathing deeply to try to continue talking more calmly.

See I don't want to do any harm. You and me want the same thing now. I want try to help Rayane. Rayane is having nightmares now that she can't wake up. She didn't say anything about her past. Something tells me that you like Rayane a lot.
Rainbow Queen made a slight smile a little evil when listening to Vinny's words.

How interesting. Is Rayane trying to make some kind of new friendship? I think this guy is going to need a special ritual for me to show him who he's dealing with. He seems to be more innocent than a dangerous pony.

Hmmmm. I appreciate your courage in your words. You will have your little chance to see me walk away without bad things happening to you. You were too cowardly to just throw a little stone next to me.
Vinny was a little surprised to hear that. But he tried to keep quiet to continue listening to the conversation.
Really very interesting. I'm understanding what's really going on here. This pony is really very silly. It's going to be fun tormenting this guy's life until he learns a lesson.
Heh~ If you really want to have my trust, then I'll wait for Rayane to say that to me. Now if you make a wrong move...
Rainbow Queen gave a sinister little laugh as she ended the words in a sinister and seductive way.
You're going to have some serious problems with me~

Then Rainbow Queen used horn magic and levitated a long shiny scythe, and then used the scythe to finish levitating something around her, but Vinny just couldn't see it. Vinny was much more surprised, watching the scythe, trying to understand what kind of pony Rainbow Queen is.
W-what?! But what the fuck is this?!

Weeeell... About the cave. This was Rayane who diminished the strength of my smartmoby. I understand you don't believe me right away, it's okay. But Rayane is in great need of help now. I can stay here until she wakes up.
Rainbow Queen looked a little more serious and does a movement with the scythe, bring Vinny's face closer.
Ssssh... Don't try to take advantage of my emotional weakness. Many souls needs me now~
When the Rainbow Queen's scythe disappeared, Vinny accidentally lost his balance and fell to the ground.
And stay well out from PROBLEMS.
Rainbow Queen simply made a huge glow and disappeared through a teleportation spell. Vinny was still surprised and confused. But he was slowly calming down again.
W-what? Does she also know how to disappear?
When the silence finally returned. Vinny noticed that now Rayane's horn was no longer damaged as it was a few minutes ago. But Rayane was still fainting and resting.
W-wow?! Rayane?!

Vinny was very curious trying to understand what was going on. When Vinny noticed that Rayane was feeling better, Vinny tried to look where the mysterious pegasus was. Pegasus was still passed out on the ground.
Ohh... the pegasus is here too.
Vinny looked worriedly at Rayane, going to analyze if Rayane was well.
Ra-rayane?
Vinny was surprised and feeling better to feel that Rayane was breathing better than before. Vinny rearranged the blanket to keep Rayane warm gently.
Okay.
Vinny smiled for a few seconds before going to see if the pegasus was still passed out.
Time to see this suspect.
Vinny was thinking about getting the cloth and knife right away. The wind that was occurring, making Vinny feel a little cooler.
Why? Well that crazy pony could have stayed here.
Vinny took all the rags and the knife, reinforcing the bindings on the hooves, wings. Vinny finished the last progress covering the mysterious pegasus's eyes.
Hmmmm. Good.
The pegasus was still unconscious. The smoke and dust that was getting lower slowly. Vinny was starting to get worried as he noticed that the environment was getting cleaner to see.
Good. Good. This will have to be done very quickly.

Meanwhile, Rayane's horn was slightly finishing regenerating as her body started to breathe normally again, but she was still passed out. Vinny looked at Rayane again, doing Vinny feel much better and calmer.
Okay. Maybe a little time.
Vinny would place the pegasus's body next to the wall and then go back to Rayane.
Hey... My little baby? Wake up.
Vinny pokes Rayane very lightly.
Can you hear me? Is everything okay?
Vinny was shaking Rayane's body very gently. Rayane starts to touch a little, trying to wake up. Rayane was slightly trying to open her eyes.
H-huh? Rain? Is it you again?
Rayane was very confused because I still hadn't fully regained consciousness. Vinny would get curious and then just continue the conversation.
Calm down. Calm down... I'm here, it's okay.
Vinny hugs Rayane very tightly. Trying to do her feel really comfortable.
Ra-Rain? You really came back...? I-I...
Rayane slightly opened her eyes and finally realized Vinny presence.
A-aaah? Vi-vinny?
Rayane was very surprised for a few seconds. Rayane blushed a little with embarrassment, but then continued the conversation.
You're alive. I thought my force field had failed.
Rayane cries while hugging Vinny back. Rayane was very relieved to see that Vinny was okay. The hug was very comforting. Vinny smiled a little and just continued the hug.
Yes, I'm fine. I never leave your side, I've been here all along. You were VERY bad... How are you feeling now?

W-well... If the same thing can happen to us that happened to the other ponies ahead. What will happen?
Meanwhile, Hiroshi just got a little thoughtful and serious while looking at the door.

Ta-take a deep breath Hiroshi. Now is the time for you to honor your family. You need to honor the Royal Color. This is your ultimate goal. You have only one task left to do before time runs out. I know I can do it! I can!

Kai just kept helping himself to resist the pain while waiting for Rayane to finish the heal. Rowan was listening to the conversation. Then Rowan looked at Hiroshi, noticing the Hiroshi's determination, making Rowan feel a little worried as he tried to understand what was going on.
H-huh? Hiroshi?
W-wait! Vinny! Since when is Vinny a pegasus?!
Kai was surprised to have realized all this just now, causing Rowan to be accidentally interrupted.
What? Wew! Since I know myself. Rayane was helping me to protect myself through this unicorn armor.
Ah...

Kai slowly calmed down of the feeling of surprise as he realized that Rayane had finally finished healing him. But Rayane was quietly starting to get a little worried listening to what Kai was saying.
This is a improvised armor? Can I analyze this armor? I promise to be quick. We can't waste too much time here.
Vinny then was very curious and surprised, trying to understand Kai's eager look at analyzing the armor.
Huh? Ye-yes. But why?
This is very important. Okay? You need to be quiet now. Let's look at this armor.
Ooooookay?
Kai analyzed the body part of the armor, looking delicately at every detail, looking for something very specific.
W-what? What this? Oh yes! I should have suspected from the start. This armor is special.
Kai looked surprised when he had discovered something very interesting, making Vinny feel even more confused by the situation.
Spe-special? How? Are you sure?
Yes. This is one special mechanism. This mechanism can only be activated by a unicorn. This is very weird because I can't make the mechanism open. Does it need a specific spell?
What? You're just making me confused. You knew?
When Rayane finished helping everyone, she curiously listened to the conversation and approached.
Wait... What are you talking about?
So Hiroshi would stop whatever he was doing when he heard the subject of the conversation, doing everyone surprised by his reaction.
Hey! Maybe I know what you're talking about.
A-ah! Hi-hiroshi? Wait! Are you sure you're okay? I am noticing that you are very different.
Hiroshi then looked at the armor's mechanisms very curiously and was a little surprised, but soon after he took a serious look at the situation.
I-I'm fine. Don't worry about me. It's very interesting that Vinny have armor like this one.
Hey hey! Calm down! What's so special here? Rayane is the owner of the armor!
Rayane then got a little embarrassed and surprised, not knowing much what to say, so she tried to respond nervously.
I-I don't know. I just got this armor as a gift. A gift from an very old friend.
Hmmmm... Okay Rayane. You don't need to talk about it. I'm already understanding what's really going on here. Thank you.
Hiroshi took a deep breath, giving the armor a small look of nostalgia. But then he'd go back to focusing on what needed to be done.
Vinny? Can you take off the armor please? If you have this armor, you would have to know how to manipulate your magic in order to activate the mechanism.
W-what?? Who did you get it from?
Vinny take off the armor very curiously during the progress while Rayane was a little uncomfortable trying to know what to say.
Don't worry... Rayane will be able to answer you about this later. I just want to help you now.

Then Hiroshi levitated the armor and looked at it closely and used his magic to activate the secret mechanism slowly. Hiroshi then made a small hidden smile as he realized what was happening was really what he wanted to happen. Vinny would hear the sound of gears turning and soon Vinny would see that two wing outputs were released in the armor.
W-what?! What the fuck is this?! That's an alicorn armor! OH MY RAINBOW!
While Rowan was extremely scared, Kai was surprised, trying to find the right words to describe the situation. Rayane tried to hide her nervous expression during the process.

N-no... no no no no. This is impossible. Rayane has to have met someone from Royal Color to have received this armor. There's no other explanation. Ponies with artificial wings also never would wear armor like that.
I said Rayane will explain about it later. Now we have more important things to finish.
Kai, Rowan and Vinny looked curiously at Rayane during the talk.
M-me? A-ah? I-I can do my explanations after the mission. I promise this okay?.

So Rayane just used her magic to help Vinny put the armor back on, this time Vinny can finally use his wings along with the armor. Then Kai and Rowan looked at Vinny curiously. Vinny just giggles and answered.
Rayane has entrusted her to me for now. Okay guys? We can continue?
Rayane giggles nervously in response, trying to calm down from the uncomfortable situation.
Yes. Hiroshi is right. We don't have time to talk about it. Let's go.
Y-yeah! These Hiroshi stories get weirder as it becomes true.
Rowan does a smile nervously by the fear of the unknown as everyone prepares to head towards the door.
Hmmmmmm...

Vinny moves the wings slowly to see the difference, he felt more freedom to move the wings along with the armor. Vinny also felt a mysterious mysterious energy in his wings, but the energy was so weak that he just ignored it.
Okay! I still don't understand what it does. But let's go!

Then in a place not far from there, was Marlon. It was a very large room with a huge device on the ceiling. The giant device was connected to the bottom part of Pony Driland, this machine was delivering all the energy the ground needed to the surface. In this same place there were many ponies working on the machine. Looks like these ponies were trying to break some encryption to safely disarm the device.
Why is this encryption so annoying?! Why is everything in this world encrypted?!

set.playlistPlay: INFINITY - Epic Futuristic Music Mix | Atmospheric Sci-Fi Music

value: One of the ponies responsible for the defense system suddenly appears very worried in front of Marlon.
HEY SIR! SIIIIIR! HEEEEY!
Marlon then looked very suspiciously at the guard, suspicious of any possibility of risk.
Oh? Guard 951? What problem is happening now?
Hi-hiroshi! Hiroshi is almost here! The Hiroshi's group managed to disable the entire security system in the last corridor!
The Guard took several breaths to try to calm down.

Hiroshi got his strength back! Hiroshi is coming with Rayane! You have to prepare quickly! We won't be able to hold two such powerful ponies at the same time! Kai, Rowan, and another mysterious pony named Vinny are also almost here!
At the same moment Marlon was surprised, not understanding very well what was happening.
W-what? What the fuck is this?! Do something stupid creature! We are almost done with our work! I can't freak out right now because of this!
But the security systems are down! We don't know the password to turn everything back on!

NO NO NO! Many lives have already been killed because of Hiroshi's selfishness! I can't let Elite Color discover this place or we are all lost! The Elite Color is also looking to steal our fucking relic too! I don't know what's going on here anymore!
At the same time, the Guard 951 made a nervous smile, and the mysterious female pony was scared to hear Marlon's anger. The mysterious female pony would then start spy on the conversation.
O-oh my Rainbow... S-she... she won't survive if something terrible happens here! What do I do?! She has no psychological preparation for this!
So-sorry sir... Too late for you to say that. It seems that the last powerful energy that we detected here underground had the capacity to reach the surface. Everyone should now know where we are.
Marlon was surprised and very suspicious to hear this.
Th-the same powerful energy? How is this possible? Is this energy as powerful as our relic? Hmmmm...
What are you trying to say? Are here two relics?

No. I know Hiroshi very well, if we had two relics, our war would already be over. I have a bad feeling that we're going to discover something new in the worst way. Evacuate all soldiers! Only me and my research team will be staying here.
Guard 951 finds Marlon's words strange, making the guard feel a little scared.
O-okay sir!
The mysterious pony then got even more scared and ran towards the pony she was really wanting to help.
O-Oh! Oh no! IVY! I need to warn her NOW!
Marlon then looked towards the voice of the mysterious pony when he heard her scream.
AH?! YOU! NO! CAME BACK HERE NOW!
AH?! NO! LEAVE ME ALONE! YOU MONSTER!
Then suddenly Hiroshi uses him katana to cut the entrance door in two. After Hiroshi used his own hooves to punch the doors and throw them against the ground to scare everyone who was there.
BUT WHAT THE FUCK IS THIS! A-AH?! HIROSHI?!
YES! ME!

Then the research ponies activated the counterattack weapons, but at the same time Rayane appeared and penetrated the burning sword against the ground, making the flames spread quickly towards the emergency weapons to damage the equipment.
OH FUCK! RAYANE!
Vinny! It's your turn now!
FINE!

Vinny flapped his wings with the intention of spreading the fire even more. The flames started to spread faster, making several researchers get desperate and start running. The mysterious pony was very scared, but seeing that everything was out of control around her, she took advantage of this moment to go towards Ivy. Ivy was lying on a improvised bed behind the computer desk the mysterious pony was using a moment ago.
O-Oh my Rainbow! Ivy! Wake up! WAKE UP! We need to get out of here now! Don't listen to Marlon! You need to quit that job NOW! I HELP YOU FIND A NEW JOB ANOTHER DAY!
Ivy then started to wake up, extremely scared of the situation. Ivy would then start to cry.
A-ah? M-my little job? M-my... AAAAHH! W-what's happening here?!
YES! Follow me! NOW!
At the same moment, one of the weapons exploded and blocked the path of the mysterious pony.
OH NOOOO! HELP! HELP ME!
AAAHH IVY!!!! AH CAME ON!
We're close! Let's go!
You IDIOT! YOU DAMN! Why just now?!
Marlon was trying to get up in the middle of the confusion, but at the same time Rayane focused energy on the horn and shot a psychic laser to open the path.
W-what? Is Rayane attacking me? WHY?!
But at the same time Marlon used his katana to reflect Rayane's giant laser against the wall.
OH FUCK! Now everyone learned how to be a badass?!
Vinny! Get behind me. Remember that Kai and Rowan will take care of the monitoring room.
Y-yeah.
Vinny saw the giant machine on the ceiling. Vinny did a better analysis, and then realized that the machine was a little damaged.
W-what's this?

Hiroshi then became worried when looking at the damaged place where the relic was. Hiroshi then tried to advance towards Marlon, but two unicorns appeared in front of him trying to stop him. The two ponies were using spears to threaten Hiroshi to stop running.
Hmm...
Hiroshi avoided speaking words and just used the Katana between the two spears to make the two spears be forced to hit the ground.
OH NO!
He's a crazy old man!

At the same time, Rayane looked at the situation and joined the fire sword with Hiroshi's katana. Rayane then used the sword's fire to scare the two unicorns, making them stop using the spear. When Hiroshi saw the two ponies off guard, Hiroshi used the Katana to damage the horn of one of the unicorns.
AAAH!
The unicorn screamed in pain and this scared the second unicorn, making him stop fighting to go help the first unicorn.
Ca-calm down! I-I will help you!

Then Hiroshi and Rayane looked at each other to confirm that it was time to continue chasing Marlon, so the two continued to go forward. When Vinny realized that the place was seriously lacking in soldiers, he began to find it all extremely strange.
Really? Wasn't this place supposed to have more guards or soldiers?

Vinny then took his Sniper as he and tried to fly towards the top of the mysterious machine. But Vinny was interrupted by Marlon's Katana. The Katana appeared and cut Vinny's sniper in two, Vinny just saw the sniper barrel flying to the other side of the room. But the Marlon's Katana accidentally damaged the glass that was protecting the mysterious relic a little more during the progress.
AH! COME ON! MY SNIPER! MARLON!
Shut fuck up! DON'T TRY TO FINISH MY PLAN BEFORE ME!
VINNY!

Rayane used her sword fire and threw more fire around, to block the way of the other ponies that were trying to attack. So during the process Marlon levitated the sword back to protect himself from Rayane's fire.
GRRR! But what an unexpected situation. Did I have to make a change of plans just now?
Marlon breathed deeply when he realized he was surrounded by Rayane and Hiroshi.

I think I have no other choice. I can't let these idiots unite this relic with this other mysterious object. I'll need to follow my plan B which might end up being a little suicidal. Heh... A lot of shit has happened these past few days. I can't let things get any worse.
Marlon! Give up! Don't just stand there! This place is doomed to destruction! I just came to take what belongs to me!
Marlon would then start to chuckle randomly at Hiroshi's words.
So come. I will make a point of taking you to your death with me.
Meanwhile, Vinny heard the Marlon words, making Vinny feel was a little scared remembering Hiroshi's words from the last private conversation.
O-okay! Okay! I think I figured out who's going to kill Hiroshi. I need to be faster!
Vinny tried to look again at the location of the magical object. Vinny could see that the magic item was inside some very cracked glass, but the glass is looking much stronger than usual.
Very good! I'm going to need that crazy unicorn's help again!
Vinny took a little space and flew hard to head against the glass, but before Vinny finished the task, Marlon started to levitate Vinny.
GO AWAY NOW!
Fuck! Not now!
At the same time, Rayane's sword hit Marlon's helmet, making it split in two sides. Marlon then conducted quickly the Katana against the Rayane's sword.
You traitorous bitch!
SHUT UP! Don't touch VINNY!

Hiroshi tries to hit the his katana on the Marlon chest, but at the same time Marlon pushed Rayane's sword against Hiroshi's Katana to knock both of two ponies down at the same time. But Rayane didn't miss the opportunity and threw another psychic laser in Marlon's direction.
Hmmm...

Marlon tried to go towards Hiroshi, but he made an angry look when he saw Rayane's laser coming towards him. So Marlon purposely used the Katana to reflect the laser against the broken glass of the machine.
OH GOOOD! YOU DESTROYERS!
Vinny was scared to see the explosion, and at the same time grateful for Rayane's help. But then Hiroshi would interrupt him.
VINNY! THE MACHINE!
A-ah? F..Fine! Fine!
Marlon threatened to go towards Hiroshi again, but Rayane again got up and used her sword against Hiroshi's katana.

The two were silent without opening a conversation, then Rayane lowered the resistance magic on the sword to focus on the horn, making Marlon able to continue the attack. Everything was going well until Marlon realized that Rayane was going to counter attack using her horn as a sword.
What?
Marlon then put the helmet on the front, causing Rayane to destroy the rest of the Marlon's helmet.
M-MY HELMET!

Marlon is surprised and angry, without thinking twice the two pnoies started a clash of horns. Marlon sweated a little while trying to use magic to levitate the Katana again, but Rayane threatened to use the psychic laser when she felt Marlon's horn activating the magic.
ARGH!
AAAAHHH!!

Hiroshi would then suddenly appear with his Katana to try and attack Marlon directly at the first opportunity. But then Marlon made a quick energy with the horn to throw a new force field against the two ponies, making Marlon a little tired due to the speed of using the magic.
ARGH! At least I have more energy usage now that Rayane destroyed my helmet.
Marlon was surprised to hear Hiroshi approaching, as he remembers that only Rayane was knocked down.
SHIT!
MARLOOOON!!

Marlon quickly levitated the Katana back and the two katanas began to compete forces, releasing a lot of spark, while Hiroshi's katana concentrated a kind of strong energy of wind force, making Marlon find it difficult to look at Hiroshi.
YOU! AND YOUR STUPID WIND SKILL!
THIS IS NOT STUPID!! Stop NOW! Or we'll end up killing each other!!
Psychological tricks in a moment of panic not now! FINE?!
Marlon then listened around, and heard the sound of the ponies in panic giving up on continuing to help him.
NO NO!

Marlon would then bend down during the gust of wind to be pushed easier, then Marlon use one of his hooves to control the direction of the gust push. Hiroshi realized Marlon's trick, making Hiroshi stop the gust. Marlon threatened to counterattack, making Hiroshi put the katana back on his front. When Marlon saw Hiroshi's defensive pose, Marlon then prepared a dark energy to make a surprise attack on Hiroshi.
Ma-marlon? This... this is a suicide attack!
Heh heh. Yeah... And it will be fun.
Marlon greatly increased the intensity of his magic to try to survive the explosion. Hiroshi made a look of mercy asking him to stop what he was doing.
AAAAAHHH!!!

Then Marlon performed his dark energy skill. Energy exploded in Hiroshi and Marlon. Marlon was beginning to tire much faster than usual. Hiroshi's Katana was falling apart due to the build up of energy. Hiroshi lost consciousness as his body was moved toward the machine due to the dark energy pushing him towards it.
N-no! Hiroshi! VINNY! HIROSHI! NOO!!
Rayane was scared of the possible death of Hiroshi. So Rayane would get up and use her psychic ray to try to disrupt Marlon's energy path.
NO WAY!
Marlon was a little surprised and Hiroshi's body started to slip out of Marlon's dark energy due to Rayane's psychic energy.
N-NO NO!
Vinny would then get very scared to see the energy approaching him.
OH FUCK! OH FUCK! OH FUUUUUCK!!! N-no no no no... WHY ME?!

Vinny was trying to hold Hiroshi to lessen the impact of his body, but during the process the dark energy also hit very close to him, causing the two to be thrown towards the ground. Parts of the machine began to come apart, releasing many violent sparks of energy all around. Parts of the ceiling were beginning to collapse, and the wall was beginning to have difficulty maintaining itself.
Fuck fuck fuck... Ah? I am alive? Am I really alive?

Vinny started to come back to consciousness and saw that Hiroshi was looking at him. During this time many ponies were already abandoning the place. A red alert started to beep extremely loudly throughout the room.
Vi-vinny... Ple-please. Use your radar. Do something with this radar to protect us. This radar has the power of the Master Smart Moby. Please do something...
Ra-radar?

As Vinny looked around, he saw the radar lying beside him. So Vinny hugs the radar, thinking about what to do. Then Vinny looked around and realized that Rayane and Marlon were rivaling the energy rays against each other. This violent process was causing parts of this energy to be accidentally flung sideways against the walls and the machine.
Y-yeah... yeah. Okay. I can't let myself be that useless now.
Vinny would then turn on the radar. The radar prepare to emit a new signal while Vinny crawled on the floor towards Rayane slowly. Meanwhile, Hiroshi was looking at Marlon's chaos for a few seconds.
You guys are so rude!! They could have at least introduced themselves!!
Hiroshi was trying not to cry during the process as he saw all the chaos going on around him.
Rayane is not using her full power. Marlon is getting weak too. Rayane knows this room will collapse if she destroys Marlon. Ma-maybe I can help everyone for the last time.
Hirsohi slowly started to get up and moves a little faster towards Vinny.
Vi-vinny? What's this beeps again? Ple-please... came back here. Ah?
Hiroshi was surprised to see the radar on. Then the radar started getting ready to emit the signal and at the same moment it slowly started to beep extremely hard.
Ye-yes! The radar! I need the radar energy!
Vinny? I am busy! We can't let Hiroshi die here! You should be running away from this place!
No! I'm not going to let the charming Rayane die without kissing me for the first time.
Rayane blushed a little not knowing what to say to Vinny.
W-well... So what's your plan?
Heh. Can this radar interact with the supposed magic item?
Marlon was surprised to begin to feel radar energy. Marlon would start to feel scared and slowly start to deplete the energy of the attack.
I-I don't know. So-sorry!
W-wait. ah? W-what?! What stupidity is that again?!
Hmmm... Marlon seems to be behaving a little strangely. Maybe this plan will work.
When Rayane started to feel Marlon's energy weakening, she started to change the direction of her attack delicately, making more things explode around to try to disturb Marlon's vision.
Vi-vinny! Rayane! Look at me please!
So Hiroshi was surprised and scared to see the magic item was starting to shine a lot too, making the machine get even more damaged during the process more and more.
O-oh no. I am not liking this.
Wh-WHAT'S GOING ON?! WHAT FUCK IS THIS?!
SHUT UP MARLON! Look here!!
A-ah? Th-this is a radar?
W-wait! NO NO NO! N-no! VINNY! YOU IDIOT! The radar is doing something with the magic relic! I can't allow this!!! STOP!! STOP NOW YOUR IDIOTS!!
Marlon started to cough due to all the dust and smoke, definitively stopping using the attack. It also made Rayane temporarily stop attacking the walls to come up with a quick plan.
Vinny! It worked! You helped make the machine destroy itself faster! I think we can all get out of here alive! Is Hiroshi here?
Rayane without thinking twice started to concentrate the teleportation magic. Vinny then felt a little regretful about leaving Hiroshi alone.
He was passed out on the floor. I'll try to bring him here.
VINNY!! TURN OFF THE RADAR! PLEASE!
What? HEY HIROSHI! Huh? Why is he also asking to turn off the radar?
THE RADAR!
STOP THIS STUPID RADAR NOW!
Vinny was very nervous looking at the two ponies at the same time asking to turn off the radar.
Vinny! Calm down! The teleport is almost ready!

Then the radar emits an immense flash and at the same time the magic item that was stored began to collapse the machine due to the extreme force that was being emitted because of the radar. Then the machine definitely blew the ceiling, and began to collapse.
NOOOOO! NO! WE WILL DIE!
Marlon crawled on the floor, desperately trying to reach Vinny, Rayane, and Hiroshi while trying to prepare an emergency force field spell.
EVERYONE! PLEASE! Just trust me!!
Meanwhile, not far away, the mysterious female pony was finishing digging up Ivy who was trapped between the pieces of ceiling.
W-what's happening here? I-I'm not dead yet? O-oh my Rainbow...
Ivy started to cry when looking at everything destroyed around her, but tried to remain calm when she saw the mysterious pony.
NO! And you will not die! If Marlon is going to die here! I WILL DIE WITH HIM! YOU HAVE A LIFE AHEAD!
Y-you? Bu-but but...
Everything keeps exploding and crashing down but and more, but the mysterious pony continued to help Ivy stay safe under the rubble of destruction.
But... but you...
Ivy cried more during the situation. But then suddenly the mysterious pony disappeared as more rubble fell on the place.
AAAAHHH IIIIVY! AAAAAAHH!!
NOOOOOOOOO!
EVERYPONY! I-I THINK I'M LOSING CONTROL OF MY MAGIC!
Rayane was starting to get scared as she saw the magic in her horn was starting to waver.
AH!
Hiroshi was also a little scared to see his horn's magic wavering as well.
W-why is the relic interacting with me too?

Then the flash and the huge sound of energy that was coming from the ceiling. Vinny thought it strange that the radar was being pulled towards Rayane for no reason, so Vinny just hugged Rayane's legs. During this process the sparks of energy from the radar began to enter Rayane's horn much stronger than normal, something strange would start to happen and it looked like something was conflicting with Rayane's teleportation magic.
O-Oh no! M-my magic! N-NOO!
SORRY RAYANE!!
Ha-ham?! what's happening?!

Then suddenly Rayane's eyes glowed in an extremely colorful way until they were completely white, making everyone feel that the teleportation was much more different than normal. Then suddenly Rayane's eyes glowed in an extremely colorful way until the Rayane's eyes were completely white. Everything ended in a huge flash for a huge silence that made all the sounds of explosions and destruction around disappear during the process.
Everything was in complete silence. It seems like a long period of time has passed, but no one knows how much time has actually passed. Vinny would then slowly begin to open his eyes.
A-ah.. Rayane? Where am I? Rayane? Rayane! RAAAAYNE! How are you?!

Vinny only heard the sound of some rocks falling to the ground. Vinny was desperately looking for any sign of life, until finally Vinny found Hiroshi and Rayane passed out under some rocks, everyone was hurt, and Hiroshi's magic horn was failing to work. When Vinny's vision was clearing more and more, Vinny soon saw that there were many more teleported rocks around.
Rayane! Hiroshi! No!
Vinny would then run over to Rayane and Hiroshi and try to wake them both up.
Please! Wake up! Wake uuuuup!
Then Rayane would start coughing as she woke up slowly during the progress. But Hiroshi unfortunately didn't react.
Hiroshi? Rayane? Ah? RAYANE!
Vinny hugged Rayane tightly when he saw that she was alive, helping to get the rocks off of her and off of Hiroshi. Vinny was very emotional and started talking to Rayane.
Calm down, I'm here, everything went well, we made it. Okay?
Rayane coughed a little more before opening her eye slightly and looking at Vinny before smiling a little in response.

Vi-vinny? Vi-vinny... how good it is to see you. Ye-yes. I'm fine... and... I'm just... so tired. I don't know what happened. I completely lost control of my teleportation. I don't know how many ponies I teleported.
Calm down, everything will be fine, it seems that your teleport range was very strong.
Stro-strong? Th-this is impossible... So where are we?
Let me turn on the hat flashlight.
Vinny then takes the flashlight helmet and turns on slowly during the talk while lightly hugging the radar to keep it safe.
Hmmmm...

Vinny could tell he was in an underground train station, but everything was completely destroyed and the railway was blocked by rocks. Vinny could also see bodies of ponies passed out, some looked like they were dead. But Vinny could still see a small glow that was slowly fading from the rocks, this glow seemed to be from the magic item.
Ah? Th-this is? Y-YES! I DID!
Vinny was going to check the supposed shine, Vinny found the magic relic. The magic item was completely intact and just finishing giving off the glow.
YES!
Vinny pick up and kept the magic relic and then went to help Rayane to get up happily.
Heh! Rayane, we are at a train station.
The... the same station? So... can we leave this terrible place?
Yes. it's all right. I found what we came for... come on, I'll help you up.
Vinny continued to help Rayane during the conversation. Rayane tried to keep breathing calmly until Rayane got scared when she saw Hiroshi's body on the floor.
Hi-hiroshi?
Vinny placed his hoof on Rayane's shoulder gently.
You need try to relax a little, this place looks very different. Looks like we're going to have a long walk of conversations and silly jokes still ahead.

Rayane giggles nevously at Vinny words, while trying to keep calm about the situation. Vinny was looking around curiously for some seconds. But Vinny didn't find any train. Vinny just found bodies and more bodies on the floor.  And in the middle of all the bodies Vinny saw something that looked like Marlon's hoof.
And... and the others? Kai? Rowan?
Vinny was worried hearing this, and tried to remain calm during the dialogue.
N-no no no... I didn't see them, just from what looks like the hoof of the Marlon buried there. let's ground him for now.
Ma-marlon? Are you sure? What if he causes trouble again?
What do you want to do? Cut his hoof? He is already buried, if we get him out of there we will help him.
Rayane was confused about Vinny's actions, and just kept worrying if Hiroshi was alive or not. So Rayane just breathed deeply and tried not to cry as she answered.
O-okay. I-I-I will trust you.
Suddenly Hiroshi coughed a little, he tried hard to keep breathing during the progress.
Hiroshi!
Rayane felt relieved and tried to hug Hiroshi like a grandfather. Vinny was surprised, making Vinny look at Hiroshi too. Vinny then smiled too when he saw Hiroshi alive.
Hi-hiroshi? Hey! Wake up Hiroshi, we're fine, we made it!
Hiroshi made a small smile when he saw Rayane and Vinny alive.
He-hello Vi-vinny. He-hello Rayane.
Hiroshi would then start coughing more during the conversation.
This... this is all really weird. All this time this radar seemed to be showing the Master Smartmoby. I don't understand... Our magic relic is a part of the Master SmartMoby?
So Rayane was surprised to hear that. Rayane began to suspect when she heard Hiroshi's tone of voice.
Wait... so you also know the story of the Master Smartmoby?
Yes... the Master Smartmoby... it belonged to Princess Ariella. I can't hope that she is alive anymore if we found the Master SmartMoby destroyed. I thought she was immortal.
Vinny and Rayane then were even more surprised not knowing what to say.
Hi-hiroshi. I still have so many questions to ask. I just need to get some rest. But I would really like to hear more about you.

Rayane then tidied up the destroyed place a little to make it more comfortable to lie down. Hiroshi laughed a little emotionally as he answered. Hiroshi then just put his hoof on Rayane's head for her to close her eyes a little to rest.
Yes. I understand. We can do that after you're feeling better. We all almost died. Let's calm down a bit.

Hiroshi coughed a little more and kept opening his eyes a little more, but still having a little difficulty breathing. When Hiroshi looked at Vinny's face, Vinny looked worried about Hiroshi's health situation.
Vi-vinny. I just want to ask you a simple question. Did you get the... magic relic? A-and where is Marlon?
Vinny was slowly getting more worried, thinking about trying to keep Hiroshi resting.
Well... We have a strange situation, we are in a totally different place, Marlon is buried with his hoof out.
Hiroshi would then be startled into a feeling of great urgency upon hearing this.
Ma-marlon? is alive? I-I-I need to talk to him. I really need to talk to him. This is the best time for me to talk to him,
Hiroshi tries to make an effort to try to make some movement during the process. When Vinny realized this, Vinny tried to help Hiroshi to walk, but tried to make him not try too hard.

I'm helping you. if you don't want my help I can put the stones back as all stones were at the beginning. Relax! We're not enemies, maybe it's Hiroshi and Rayane. I need to talk to you before anything else.

M-my side of the story?

THEN LOOK AT THIS! Look how many lives were lost because of a idiot! Hiroshi!! All he had to do was just give me the fuck damn magic relic! BUT NOT! HE BUILDS A POWERFUL FUCK BUNKER! FORCES ME TO USE AN EXTREMELY POWERFUL BOMB! And you still tell me you're on the side of this imbecile who keeps playing me like a STUPID?!

Calm down, relax, I'm aware that the relic was with him, I want to understand why you guys didn't get along, why he didn't give it to you.

Marlon tried to get up again while continuing the conversation.
He doesn't deserve to take care of the West region anymore! I WOULD KILL HIM AS SOON AS I FIND HIM AGAIN! He doesn't deserve to be alive anymore after all this has happened!

Marlon... Calm down. Please calm down. Hiroshi was wrong, yes he was wrong, but you threw a bomb killing many innocent ponies, I was right there on top of the bomb trying to avoid that. Meanwhile, Hiroshi was in his place, he was much more depressed than usual.
And Hiroshi was...! Ah? What? Is that old pony depressed now in a few seconds? What's his problem?

I know it's extremely difficult to see what your population are doing. But violence doesn't lead to anything, if you really wanted the relic because you didn't want to know the real reason he didn't give it to you? No one denies magic items out of nowhere while the neighbor is in need. you didn't do anything?
Then suddenly Marlon and Vinny were startled by Hiroshi's voice coming suddenly.
ENOUGH! Please... That's enough. Please stop. I don't want to see everyone fighting anymore after everything that happened.
When everyone looked at Hiroshi, they noticed that Hiroshi was very depressed.
HEY! Do not yell at me! I will still kill you for all this! Okay?
SHUT THE FUCK UP! You two look like 2 children. Hiroshi is true all this? You didn't want to buy the deal and took the relic just for you and left the Marlon region impoverished?

I-I already understand that it's no use hiding my biggest sin from all of Pony Driland. I was just afraid of your violent behavior that was getting out of control. You were starting to getting angrier with every passing moment. I was afraid you would become a dictator.

You always told me that you wanted to dominate the West region, this all just reinforced me to be more and more rigid in protecting the West region. The energy of this world is starting to get more and more limited. It was no longer possible to reserve our magical relic between our regions. And I knew very well that your region was running out of money. You didn't have more money to buy our stuff every time we spent more time with the relic selling our products. So... I made the worst choice of mine.
Then Hiroshi took a deep breath.
I didn't just build the bunker. But I tried to tax my own population to try to raise money to donate to the East region.

But... I was wrong. I started to lose popularity, everyone started to believe me less and less and called me crazy for trying to do that. And my attempt to lessen the hatred between the two sides only made it worse. You got even angrier at me. My populace was getting mad at me. And the beginning of our war was the biggest consequence that happened. All this could have been avoided. If I had tried from the beginning to dialogue with you. Then more tears started to fall from Hiroshi's eyes. And Marlon was surprised and sorry for everything that happened.
I really am a big idiot. Many lives could have been spared if I really had done my part from the beginning.
Marlon was then still surprised at each progress of the conversation.

Yeah... and I always thought it was suspicious that you had the relic and made all those traps. I was wanting to take Hiroshi out of power to try to reunite the East and West region. That's all. But everyone in the West region was afraid of me because my magic element is dark. But if Hiroshi is sorry, this might be different. Maybe we could try to do something different?
But Marlon... Where did you get the powerful bomb?
Marlon took a deep breath before answering. Marlon was confused and trying to remember about this information.

Th-the bomb? The bomb was the creation of a mysterious energy source that one of my military found. They never told me what this source was in more detail. But they said they managed to extract enough of the energy to make the bomb.
Marlon, please forget about all this. I don't want to hear about bombs and wars anymore. I'm already feeling happy just hearing your side.
Then Hiroshi would start to look very empty and hopeless. Hiroshi had a much deeper feeling than simple depression. Vinny and Marlon were a bit scared and worried about the whole situation.

Vinny would then turn completely white upon hearing this in fear upon remembering these words spoken by Hiroshi earlier.

Vinny would then start laughing nervously as he listened to this, trying to understand what was going on. Both Vinny and Marlon were a little scared and confused.

Hi-hiroshi? What do you mean pact? Does it exist in this world? Who is this pony you made the pact with?
Hiroshi then prepared to say his last words as he try to look for acceptance of what was about to happen.

You two never understand how I've lived for over 100 years? I have passed through more than a generation of Pony Driland. I had an eternal life pact with Rainbow Queen herself. Bu-but in return. I was supposed to be the guardian of the original story of Pony Driland. She told me I shouldn't start any wars. I shouldn't put the lives of innocent ponies in danger.
Hiroshi then made a small, very sad farewell smile.

It seems that our goodbye is coming. After more than 200 years of life. It seems that my final judgment will come. My final judgment where I can at least finally rest in peace. I managed to at least do something very important in my last hours of life. Thank you Vinny and Marlon.

Hiroshi lamented a lot while holding the amulet that had the photo of his family, along with other ponies, and one of them Vinny could recognize Rainbow Queen, but she had a much whiter skin and less obscure appearance.

You can't leave everything as it is now, let's fix everything first, let's unite everyone so you can leave in peace. Will Rainbow Queen pick you up in person?
Ye-yes! What will happen to everyone without you? You could have at least told me your age for all of us. I have never seen this Rainbow Queen. H-How will I know who she is?
Sorry. My time is up. She is here... I won't even be able to say goodbye to everyone like I promised... Y-you all are now in charge of sending my farewell.

Try to wake everyone up, we're already late. Your military didn't find the bomb material thrown in the wild. Your military took something so potent from someone pretty big i guess i would keep an eye on the strength you give the military! They can fool you and take power and everything get worse!

Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay, who am I? What's your wish? tell me go.

Wait... a pony? Is Hiroshi hurt? I can heal Hiroshi again.

W-well.. Th-this is not Hiroshi. That's far from your abilities, Hiroshi had a deal with your dark friend. C-Come on, I'll take you, let's go along, if you need a shoulder I'll be with you there. Hiroshi had his last wishes granted in the last moments which was to apologize to Marlon and see his friend. Marlon is alive and he wants no harm. just don't get too upset all right?
Ma-marlon? W-what?

A-ah? Ye-yes yes. Sorry.

Rayane was worried about Hiroshi, but she tried to calm down when she saw the pony. Then Rayane gently uses her magic to remove the rest of the other stones. Vinny would then try to look at the mysterious pony's face during the process.

Rayane then helped to make the place more comfortable using her magic for the body of the mysterious pony to be able to lie down again. Vinny and Rayane realized that the body is a pegasus. The pegasus eyes were trembling a little. Rayane and Vinny were a little surprised to see the survivor.

Her body needs time to she come back to consciousness. I'm sure at some point she'll open her eyes.
