Ra-Rainbow Queen? The mysterious goddess of Hiroshi legend? A powerful entity with uncontrolled mood? This entity can drain so much energy at the same time?! N-no! There's something very wrong with that! This is impossible!
James? Hello? JAAAAMES! Calm down James, we'll get along with each other over time.
A-ah? Me? So-sorry! But the name is Rainbow Queen? This name is very familiar. I heard a lot of ponies like Marlon and Hiroshi talking about her.
James tried to keep calm, while trying to hold back his tears when talking about Hiroshi, but then he tried to go back to maintaining the conversational posture.
Rainbow Queen has a scythe. Things are just getting worse. I don't believe my worst theory of all is more realistic than I imagined. I don't know how I will calm something like Rainbow Queen!

Oh fuck god... We are in danger. A very serious danger. About the machine... Please give them to me. Maybe I can figure out how to make a new version of it that can benefit both regions. We have extremely serious problems. We failed to recover what could save both regions. We need a plan B.
Vinny then made a worried look at James while delivered the piece of the machine to James.
Here, James. But... Can we talk alone?
James was then very curious about Vinny's question. James feel a little hope of having more information he need.
Ah? What?

Before I want everyone to know that nobody is to blame for everything that happened here, I talked to Marlon, he is responsible, but in the last moments Hiroshi explained the whole truth and apologized to Marlon. Hiroshi was partly to blame for make the neighboring region poorer. Anyway  Marlon has to own up to his mistakes, but he's already redeemed himself, Hiroshi wouldn't want anything bad to happen to him.

Everyone all kept quiet and only agreed out of respect for Hiroshi. Only Kai was a little more curious trying to understand what was going on. James then breathed deeply and looked at Rayane for a few seconds. James thought it was strange to see that Rayane was looking to be more distant from the group during the walk.
Alright, just hold on a moment, Vinny.
Vinny was a little confused when looking back and seeing Rayane, so Vinny just was quiet and watched. James approached Rayane slowly when he saw that she was doing a depressed look.
Rayane?
H-huh? What? James?
Rayane was curious, but James wasted no time and gently connected a cable to Rayane's Smartmoby.
Wh-what?
Rayane wiped her eyes a little while looking at the cable.

You should have told me that your Smartmoby has a mod to have installed a map. I realized that just when you used that magic on Wagner. So please... take the others back to the surface while I talk to Vinny. I know you will be able to find Wagner alone for this reason.
The cable started transmitting information to Rayane's Smartmoby, and she was a little surprised while waiting for the cable to finish the service.
Ye-yes. It's ok James, I'll be waiting for you two.
Rayane lowered her head, crying a little more before offering for Kai and Rowan to accompany her. Kai was curious about the scene, but accepted the situation.
Ah? Did we really travel that far? I didn't expect this to be the nearest village.

Don't worry Vinny. We'll see Marlon again soon. If he's sorry, he's probably walking around the region alone. I just need to know where to find him. In a way, this is not a good time for us to decide who the real culprit is. I wanted to talk to Marlon better about it.
Kai looks at Rowan gently during the talk. Rowan was feeling sad, but was a little surprised to look at Kai's determination.
Rowan! It's now. Come on... We have to go back now.
Ye-yes Kai. It's ok.

Rowan and Kai followed Rayane out of the room towards the exit that now Rayane knew where it was. Vinny just expected everyone to enter the elevator. When this finally happens, then James and Vinny looked curiously at each other.
Okay. I think we can talk better alone now. And thanks for sharing the piece of machine.
Vinny does a look of regret for James and answered.

I'm sorry I spoke to you from the first time on the train, adrenaline pumping. Anyway, I just want you to know that even though I was far from you I didn't forget about you. I remembered you at times.
Vinny took out the 2 tablets and gave them to James.

And look here... I found these 2 tablets earlier in a little room, sort of returning your tablet that I broke over the pony's head on our first time. You can take it, they are common tablets, but before you do something, it would be good to look at what data is on it, you may have more truths about Hiroshi and the relics. I took them along with Rayane, Kai and Rowan, they are yours now.
James looked at the tablets curiously, with a look of hope.

Tha-thank you. Don't worry Vinny. I always have my moments of reflection. It's at these times that I realize where I went wrong. I'm glad to know that you remembered me. Because I really had a few life crises when I tracked your Master Radar and found you were very far from me. Heh... Don't worry so much about that tablet. After everything that's happened, I have no reason to be mad at you for a tablet I can just build a new one.
James analyzed the tablets for a few seconds before answering, getting slightly surprised.
Oh... these are not ordinary tablets. They are tablets that store documents. Maybe we'll find out something even about this machine that I'm going to build.
Heheh! Well, the tablets are yours, now you owe me a tablet.
Vinny gives James a big hug in response. James was a little surprised by the hug, but he smiled a little before giving a hug back.
It's good to have you back by my side! But hey! Let's go? How are we going to leave? Do you think we can use the radar to help in the region?
Yes, if I find out more about this Hiroshi device, maybe I can create a new energy distributor. We can even use it to recharge the Master Radar without having to have the Master Smartmoby piece.
Vinny giggles a little in response.
Yes. Come on, I have a lot to talk about with you, male to male subjects!
Heh. I say the same. Maybe we want to talk about the same subject.
Even worried, James tried to keep his smile on his face as James and Vinny entered the elevator that had already returned to the underground.
Same subject? Is it something about charming and beautiful and single ponies? If it's not about that, what's it about?
James does an embarrassed facehoof.
Ah? Wait? What? N-no! Okay. Maybe your unexpected subject leads me to what I'm trying to talk about, but that's not what it's about.
Hmmm... Well, we're alone and it looks like we're going to be alone in the elevator, you can count on me for anything and everything? Is it about Rayane?
James press the button to close the elevator door. Then the elevator finally started to go up. Then James looked curiously at Vinny after hearing the question.
Rayane? No. I'm referring to the mysterious entity. Rainbow Queen... I still know very little about this mysterious alicorn.
Vinny then made a curiosity look, trying to understand the reason for James's concern.

Well, as far as I know. Rayane knows her more. She and Rayane were already some kind of partners. I really think that Rayane and this goddess have some involvement with Elite Color. I don't know how it is for Rayane, but I think she doesn't touch on this subject and doesn't even like to comment as I ask something related. Rayane hides things from me but I think some things she doesn't even know, like she has something missing from her memory. I had 3 opportunities to talk to this goddess, and at 3 she got mad at me.
James was a little confusing for a few seconds, speechless to describe what was happening. But then he finally tried to say something.

Pa-partners? I'm surprised about it all. But what kind of involvement? Are you referring to some sort of agreement between the two sides? Where did you get this conclusion about Rayane is also in this story? Ah yes... stories... Maybe she lost someone very important to Elite Color and she doesn't want to show this side of some possible friendships of hers.
James gets very curious and thoughtful about the subject for a seconds. But James was still very uncomfortable and afraid to talk about Rainbow Queen.
Well... About the goddess... Rainbow Queen was angry. It's a divine entity. She has a scythe. My theory that is forming is not good. Do you know anything else to tell me about it?

Yes it was in the cave, Rainbow Queen knew we were there, she doesn't even want to get close to Rayane. But Rayane wants me to make her look "good". Everyone knows Rayane, everyone from the Elite Color talks to her. I heard Rayane talking to the commander that Rayane betrayed her, and that the commander was not to let her head.
Vinny scratched his head and returned to the subject.

It's hard for me to point out that Rayane was part of the Elite Color, or still is. Ivy also said the last thing she listened to about Rayane was that she was through a scientist. Did she ever tell you to stop your research?
James was very surprised, with difficulty answering Vinny's words.

Ra-rayane meet the commander?! Okay! Hmmmm... If Rayane knows this goddess... So it makes a lot of sense for Rayane to have a little divine aura in her body. Alicorns can transfer some of their divine auras to other common ponies. It's like planting a seed to later bloom.
James was very surprised, with difficulty answering Vinny's words.

Weeeeell... No. Rayane never said anything related to that to me. She just seemed to keep an eye on me and liked to tease me as if she wanted to try to find out more about me. But in the end she suddenly changed. She dropped all this mystery and started treating me more like a friend through her silly jokes with you.
Vinny was then a little more curious before she continued the conversation.

About divine aura, when some very deep feeling happens, like anger, sadness, some black marks come out of the body and eyes. After calming the body goes back to normal. This moment happened in your elevator, and it happened to Rainbow Queen. I really wouldn't like it but in the end, something very bad will happen.
James then started to get scared and responded in a tone of voice of fear.

Hmmm... Tattoos? Divine aura? No! It really all makes sense and it really is something much more dangerous than you might think. Our lives really could be very much in danger, not only ours... But the entire dimension!
James was very worried and started to get very anxious and feel a little sick.

Divine powers! They can't get out of control! N-no no! When a divine creature becomes angry or sad, it reflects in the way it uses the powers! But when it starts to get too much out of an alicorn's control, then it gains possession of the magic scythe! Yes! The scythe! This scythe is a way to drain an alicorn's hatred so it doesn't go completely insane. This scythe has a lot of power energy precisely because of negative feelings. But here comes another problem.
James breathed deeply.
If this scythe can't be enough to hold an alicorn's rage, it ends up becoming another weapon for that alicorn, and when it's mastered, it becomes extremely even more dangerous.
Vinny then made a small gulp before continuing the conversation.
Oh fuck...

Okay! Okay okay. Good to know that. Rayane has great power. Rayane just needs to be careful using it. But since we are in this conversation about power... I really need something, some weapon, some power. I can't go all or nothing. I'm fighting for my life using my life, I really need something. How long will it take?
Vinny then looked around, suspicious of something randomly, then looked back at James.
You know James, unfortunately in certain situations I can be a bit of a bad influence. For example Rayane almost killed the commander herself. If anyone thinks it came from me? Or even from you?

W-what? N-no Vinny! Rayane likes you. She's with us because of you. You would never be a bad influence on her. Remember it's not your fault she did this. She has her reasons for being like this. Rayane's true power is still hidden. But we need to at least help her to evolve it in a healthy way, she needs to have a healthy life for that. We can't let her have the same fate as Rainbow Queen.
James tries to get up a little to calm down while he was very thoughtful about the conversation.
Don't worry. I've been working on your possibles weapons for you for hours. I was very worried about it, that's reason it was one of my priorities.

Vinny and James started to hear the sound of very strong rain when the elevator was very close to finally reaching its final destination. Then Vinny and James looked at each other and stared at before James continued the conversation. James was very quiet, in a very lonely look, Vinny just watched, worried about James.
In the end it seems I just created more trouble by inventing the technology of artificial dimensions. and... I lost my planet.
James looked at him amulet. The same amulet that he had looked at in the laboratory. Then James started to cry.
I lost a friend that I loved so much that now I don't even know what part of the universe she is in. And now I'm going to lose all my creation along with my life and friends!!
James tried to calm down while cleaning his face a little.

Ja-james? Calm down, we all make mistakes. I'm here. Rayane, and Kenny is here too. I'm actually worried about him. But don't worry. We'll really manage, if we're going to stay alive we'll stay, if we're going to die... Well... It's not really a motivating stage but we're going to do everything to delay this or never happen.
Vinny giggles a little to try to cheer James, so Vinny hugged him in response. James lifted his face a little and looked at Vinny. James was doing a depressed look, but he kept answering.

Kenny? Kenny is fine. I never let him leave the first village because it's the safest place in this world. I'd rather have a little hope that we'll stay alive. But if I die... I want to at least talk to this goddess. I know this is crazy. But my last alternative might be make some pact with Rainbow Queen. For the good of all of you.
Vinny was then completely surprised to hear this, and then interrupted James.

HEY! HEY HEY! Calm down there! I can do Rainbow Queen talk with you, now you want to give her something of yourself? You don't know her intention. If she stole a part of Master Smartmoby and maybe she's working for Elite Color? Why would you want to make a pact? Rainbow Queen is a goddess, she has everything, do you have something she wants? Really if she wants to screw me and Rayane she can use you. You can be you James, it will work out in the end, trust me.
James was completely surprised to hear Vinny's words.

Ye-yes. She's a goddess. If she wants to... she can erase this entire dimension in a few seconds and create a new one. If we're still alive, it's because she has a special reason for all this. Maybe I have something she wants. This can be the knowledge of how this dimension works. If Rayane has any involvement with this, maybe that's what she was going to do to me and she didn't.

My world also had gods. Don't believe everything, she has the power to destroy the world why didn't she? Even if I pissed her off, I'm aware of my situation. If Rainbow Queen is involved with the Elite Color, the Elite Color wants to triumph, and won't triumph destroying the world, relax. Honestly, I think Rainbow Queen works for Elite Color. I found a computer in the banker there was a kind of radar similar to your room, where it located a kind of energy, where it kept giving spikes in several places, and I'm almost sure it's her. You don't have to be sad, you're outraged by it all.
Vinny breathed deeply before continuing the conversation.

Even gods have their limits, for example, she should have killed me 3 times. Mayabe she guides the dead somewhere, like a reaper, shinigame or death personified. You're just aiming at the bad things, look at all the good things you did, you saved me with Rayane. You saved an innocent pegasus, who has spent her entire life alone in her parents' absence. Ivy is a adult who acts like a child, she and Wagner met before the attack, I even gave her a "push" to get to Wagner. Ivy really likes Wagner, if all goes well, you not only saved us, but also solved the Wagner and Ivy's problem, making maybe a future couple. The two ones can live in peace helping each other now thanks to you. You need to forgive yourself! No pacts with gods! If you need a pact talk to me!
James still surprised, thought a little for a few seconds before answering. James replied on a sad tone of voice.

Guide the dead? This I wouldn't have imagined would come from her. This explains a lot of how I could rarely detect lost souls in this dimension sometimes. W-well... My knowledge goes far beyond knowing this dimension, I also know how to manipulate it if I have the right tools. My only limit is parts of the project my brother worked on without my help. About the room... It was Hiroshi who helped me send construction material to make my lab. So he shared with me some of his secret architecture to help me make the lab faster.
James lightly cried a little more fora few seconds.

But No. I'm just wishing I had one last alternative. I don't want you all to die because of me. Remember, it was because of me that this dimension came into being without any warning for both me and you. I put the lives of several creatures of different dimensions at risk. Do you realize how huge this weight is for someone who was just wanting to be at peace in the universe?
James breathed deeply, trying to feel better in his feelings.
But yes. Sometimes I forget that negative things can have their positive sides.
James giggles lightly in response.
You really like being a goof and that's what makes us happy. But I still find it curious how your original dimension looks like mine. Sometimes I think I've seen your planet somewhere.

So James decides to forget the problems for now to press the button to open the elevator door, and all Vinny and James see is a small very dark room with another door, and behind this door everyone could hear all the sound of the rain storm that was happening outside.
Oh... Heh! It's not your fault that this dimension exist. Relax... if you were the creator you would be a god or something, where would the others go?

Nah... I am not a god, but I am the developer of this reality. If I had been the first to enter this dimension, I would have been the one using the Master Smartmoby. But as I said earlier... for some mysterious reason, another creature got in here before me, and created this whole reality that was never what I planned. The life here has developed a lot, it would be wrong for me to try to intervene.
James looked at the door where the sound of the rain came from while turning on the light in the room, thinking about many things.
Well... The camp isn't far away. But you better get your raincoat.
James looks at the backpack and started to equip him raincoat. When Vinny remembered that he had used his rain cover against Prisma, Vinny smiled nervously.
Yeah... the raincoat. I think it left with the commander on the train on fire. I only have the wing cape. This works? If I have wings covering, will I help?
James was a little surprised to hear that.
Ah? W-what? Did you lose your raincoat?
Your wing cover will only help protect your wings from getting wet. Ah... Take mine then. Look at you, you're all bruised up, and I just drove the train. You need a lot more than me.
James uses him magic and took off the raincoat, and put it on Vinny in response.

Ah? He-hey! Relax! I have this armor that even Rayane lent me and it's an armor for alicorn. By the way, it's good that it washes my wounds, you'll get a cold if you don't use it, I'll be fine with this helmet you gave me.
Vinny was trying to return the raincoat to James.
But you still have bruises exposed. They'll all burn in the rain. So you better go with the cape.
James puts the raincoat back on Vinny.
But you? Will you get all wet?
Don't worry about me. just follow me.
James levitated a key card, this card looked like Marlon's card. James then used it to open the locked Bunker door. So Vinny pokes James in a friendly way.
James, look at me. If you catch a cold or think you can cry in the rain that no one notices. You'll get a marshmallow from me in
W-what? Marshmallow?
James was a little confused before laughing a little.
You really spent too much time with Rayane. I can't promise that, a lot of tragic things happened today. Maybe tomorrow we can feel better. Alright?

James and Vinny get out of the bunker, and start walking in the rain towards the camp, it looks like a vast forest. But the view of the Whicocesert Mountain was now much further away from everyone on there.
W-wow! We really are far from Kenny house.
Heh heh!
So James took the moment of opportunity to ask a very curious question.
But Vinny... What did you do to get the Rainbow Queen's attention anyway? I've never seen her in my entire life.

Ah? A-ah! I have a magnet of problems and crazy females, look at Rayane for example. Rainbow Queen will always show up if I'm around someone who has made a deal with her before or someone is dying in front of me. Anything you kill me in a safe way and resurrect me.
James giggles a little before answering in a somewhat ironic way, but without offending you.
For someone like you I think it's going to be more than normal for this to happen. It's no surprise to me to see you in these situations. But I never resuscitated anyone.

AH! You also didn't know how to drive a train. BUT! This killing me is a last alternative, I know there will be a queue for those who will want to do this. So opportunity I have, let's just leave this as a last alternative.
James then stopped walking a little and made a facehoof.
This idea of yours is just as crazy as mine of the pact. We don't know if I can bring you back to life.
During the walk, Vinny noticed the presence of the camp lights that were nearby.
Th-the camp! Yeah! By the way, you're a unicorn. Couldn't you levitate, make a shield over your head and body so the rain doesn't fall on you?
James then does a facehoof.
Don't think it's easy to do this kind of thing and walk at the same time. But wait... camp?
James then stopped the walk and smiled when he saw the lights of the camp.
Oh! There it is! We're here!
James runs towards the camp happily.
He-hey! You can go ahead! I will be watching the landscape.
Okay! But don't delay youself!
James keep running until he reached the camp. James then stopped the walk and smiled when he saw the lights of the camp.

Then Vinny laughed a little for a few seconds before him started looking around. Vinny only see trees and more trees, but in the middle of them, Vinny see a mysterious pony that was watching him, a mysterious pegasus. She was scared and seemed to have something shiny on her chest, but at the same time she left when she see Vinny looking at her.
A-ah? What?! Who is this girl?!

info.Rainbow Queen's Pet collar: This magical collar features a sleek black band with a silver buckle, fitting snugly around the wearer's neck. The most striking element is the glowing heart-shaped pendant attached to a small translucent ring. The pendant has a soft, radiant gradient of pastel colors, shifting between warm golden hues and delicate rainbow tones. At its center, a golden ankh symbol is embedded, further enhancing its mystical aura. The pendant emits a faint but constant glow, indicating an inherent magical property, possibly related to protection, power, or spiritual connection.

value: Her wings were very wet, and she was wearing a raincoat. Around her neck, a sleek black collar with a silver buckle was visible, adorned with a glowing heart-shaped pendant that shimmered in soft rainbow hues. Vinny felt a little scared upon noticing it and then tried to run toward the pony, but she kept running away.
Go away!! You monster!
No! Calm down! Don't mean no harm, why were you watching me and watching me?! Wait me!
She started to cry when she heard the Vinny voice louder. Vinny just noticed a little of her long mane, but due to the dark, Vinny had difficulty seeing the colors of her body.
Noooo! He's gonna get me! HELP! Ma-master! G-Get me out of here! I regret coming here by accident!!
Ah? Master??
At the same time Vinny noticed that her collar emitted a colored light and then she disappeared from a teleportation progress. Vinny then does a poker face, trying to think about what to do.
Aaah cool. Very Cool! Yes... more mystery problems.

Vinny then breathed deeply and went to where the mysterious Pegasus was. Vinny didn't find anything interesting for a few seconds until Vinny find something. Vinny just found a magic binoculars abandoned on the floor. The binoculars is white and had some flowers paint around.
Hmmm... Okay.
Vinny pick up the binoculars. Vinny just feel a little bit of the magic of the binoculars, it seemed to have a very different energy.
What... This seems a bit the energy of Rayane's weapons. That's weird.
Vinny then store the binoculars in the saddle before returning to the camp. When Vinny arrived at the place, Vinny find the Rayane tent, it was closed and only had the bell button.
What am I going to say to everyone? How wonderful!
Vinny then decided to play the tentbell, and cough preparing to do something silly. Then Rayane was slowly approaching the door to ask the question.
Who is?~
Hello! Do you have a minute of your time to listen to the word of the goddess Rainbow Queen?
Hmmmm... Coming from this voice from my dream?~
Rayane open the tent door, smirking at Vinny before booping Vinny in response.
I have all the time in the world~
Vinny was a little surprised by the boop.
O-Oops! Don't talk like that, otherwise you can be embarrassed in front of everyone and make everyone ashamed!
Vinny is very happy to see Rayane's face. Then Vinny hugs her, giggling in response.
Hi, how long, how are you? And how are you here?
This time Rayane was a little surprised, and giggles back while hugging back.
Shame?~ Too bad... I'm an expert on this~ We're all fine. We're chatting. Ivy is sleeping on her mattress. She's still been sleeping since that time.
Vinny then feel even happier to know that.

Good! By the way I have a question. There was a pony watching us. I like a good pony, I saw her and went to see her up close, she had a collar with a sparkle in the middle, and she was really scared and said "monster!". But then it looks like she called a master and after her collar was colored she disappeared, leaving a binoculars with an energy similar to yours.
Rayane then feels surprised, thinking of some things.
Collar? Wait... this is...
Rayane giggles in response.

Bright and colorful collar pony? Hmmm... She won't do you any harm. It was just one of Rain's pets. They all have this collar. They are completely harmless, she was more afraid of you than you were of her. Just make sure her pet wasn't gossiping about you~
Vinny does a face poker, not understanding what was really happening.
Ah? Pets? What is this goddess doing this time?
Don't spread the word about it to others. I don't think you'll like to see Rain angrier at you than she already is~
M-me? N-no no no! Rain can stay with her pets!
But wait... did you say binoculars?
Rayane is a little concerned to understand what happened.
Oh no... We'll have to give this back to her. She's going to feel really sad about losing these binoculars.
Vinny was then thoughtful for a few seconds, thinking of something, so just answered.
Wait... Can I have a positive result for this?
So are we going to return it now?
Heh~ If she was teleported. We will hardly find her again.
Vinny then just laughed a little, saying ironically.
If you want you can put a collar on me so I can be your pet and just be yours.
Rayane was then a little surprised to realize a Vinny's innocence. Rayane giggles a little more than usual.
You are much sillier than I imagined. I don't think you even know what a pet really is for Rain. Be careful with your words~
Vinny is a little confusing and curious to hear that.

W-what? Well, you never say much detail, so I have to speak blindly. Anyway I have no intention of keeping her binoculars, when you know a way to return it to her let me know. I talked some sensitive stuff with James on the way over here. And someone must be saying I'm a monster.
Vinny then giggles while answering.
Anyway! Later you explain this pet business better.
Vinny enters the tent. Rayane laughed a little more before answering.

Rain just feels a little too alone. The ponies that accept to be her pets are usually extremely depressed ponies who made that choice in a pact. So she has a special way of making these ponies happy with her silly fantasies.
Vinny does another poker face, trying to understand what is happening. Rayane was a little thoughtful before continuing talking.
What? What does this all mean?

I thought you didn't want me to finish explaining pets~ Heh. The first stage will be the hardest... We needs to find Rain's Pet again. But we'll probably find her in some village. But if she decides to go toward you, I think you will easily see her.
Rayane smirks at Vinny.
But... Only if you're a silly little monster~
Vinny then giggles at nervousness and answered.

Believe me... If Rainbow Queen spreads that I'm a bad influence, if she tells 1 pony that I'm a bad influence, that pony will tell 1 more, and this 1 will tell another pony, until I get known. But what is this Rain exchange for being a pet?
Rayane laughed a little more.
In exchange for them being Rain's pets, nothing special other than having a better life. They may even decide to stop being. But they will hardly want to give up this lifestyle.
Vinny was a little more curious and continued the questions.
What's so special about being a pet?
Hmmmmmm... Heh. It's a very personal way for Rain to feel less alone. She also needs to have intimacy with someone.
A-ah? Didn't she have intimacy with you? Weren't you guys friends?
Rayane laughed a little again. Rayane then gave up on Vinny's innocence.
Siiiiilly~ I'm not talking about that kind of intimacy.
Vinny then makes a super poker face, trying to understand what is happening again, blushing a little in response.
Will Rainbow Queen decide to destroy the world if I do something wrong?
Oh...
Okay. I prefer Rain less stressed than it is for now. But wait... This can be a good way to convince that crazy goddess on me!
WELL! Anyway I don't think Rain's Pet was curious about me, and came to see in person, but I want to change this pony's opinion at least about me.
Heh. You're much more silly than I thought with your answers.
Vinny then giggles just before answering.
I hope I don't steal another kiss. Do you think it's better to stay with me or with you?
Another kiss?~ So another bite?~
Rayane boops Vinny again while smirking at him. Then Rayane closed the tent door.
If you want it the easy way... I'll give the binoculars back to her, but then you won't have a chance to talk to her because she'll continue to be afraid of you~
A-ah? Are you hiding something? Can you give it back to her but without me?
If you want to have the Rain's Pet trust... Then you should be the one to approach her~

But why did you change the subject? Well, never mind, I know you have your secrets. But can you at least tell me where I can return the binoculars to her? I don't really want to get involved with her. If Rainbow thinks I'm stealing from her, she starts to be enchanted by my charm and starts to question Rainbow. Rainbow will turn me into a toothpick.
Silly~ I didn't change the subject. I'm just saying that my presence won't make you any less scary for someone as sensitive as her. But really, Rain can try turn you into a toothpick.
Vinny does another poker face.

And I want more trouble with Rain? You're not helping me too, I'll help you but don't tell me how not to let her want to kill me. Okay, let's enter the pony circle over there. I honestly don't care about myself, but about others at times like this.
Rayane then laughed a little more while watching Vinny going to the pony circle.
Heh~ At least I think he understood a little of the danger. I hope Vinny is careful.
Hey Guys!! Why so gossiping about me??
James found the question strange and then answered.
Gossiping? What are YOU gossiping about with Rayane! That's the real question.

Rowan laughed a little at James while Kai just stayed calm, trying to be neutral in the conversation, but he was in a good mood. The rest were just looking at Vinny curiously, trying to understand what was going on. Vinny then spoke a little funnyly.
Hey James, do you really want to know? If one day Rayane and I get married you will be our best man! Already prepare a nice gift.
James was surprised while Rowan laughed a little more.
M-marry?! We met a few days ago and you're already talking about marriage?!
Heh! But back to reality, I'm glad we're all alive and here.
Yes. On the bright side, everything turned out well. I'm sure tomorrow things will be even better.
Kai keep calm and disciplined, watching the talk.
And we had a lot of fun that night!
Jeff giggles a little while continuing to drink a cider.
That's it!
Rowan took another cider one and made a toast with Jeff. Meanwhile, Wagner was quiet in his place, but he was feeling better compared to what he was feeling a while ago.
Heheh! It was to break the "ice". But who knows in the future.
Vinny then looked at Rayane, Rayane was curious for a few seconds, but then Vinny does a smirk and then walked toward Wagner.
Silly~
Hey Wagner! How are you!?
Wagner is surprised to hear Vinny's words, so he looked curiously at Vinny.
H-huh? Vinny? I'm fine. Why?
I was worried about you! Are you feeling better than before?
M-me? Yeah. Jeff talked to me and made me feel better about everything that happened. He promised he would never hate me, so that made me start to calm down. But I'm still worried about other things.
Vinny already suspecting who Wagner was talking, then asked.
Ah? Worried? Who are you worried about?
Wagner feels a little nervousness before continuing the conversation.
It's this mysterious pony that Rayane brought here. I still don't understand who she is. But something tells me she's a little familiar.
A-aaahh? You don't know her?
Wagner looked at Vinny sadly before answering.
Yeah. The blanket doesn't let me look at she completely. But I don't want to hurt her accidentally because of my curiosity. Maybe I'm confusing her with another pony.
But... Which pony are you confused with? Do you have someone special?
Wagner breathed deeply.
A pegasus... I was feeling very sorry for her when Marlon was asking her to carry one of the bombs. I didn't want to see Marlon taking all his anger out on that pegasus.
So you switched roles with her?
Yes. She was almost trying to kill herself due to the task she had to do.
Vinny was a little surprised and then the conversation continued.
Calm down, I know she must be safe and sound somewhere now, if you saw her what would you do? By the way you're talking, it even gives the impression that you liked her.
Wagner giggles a little embarrassed.

She seemed very lonely and told me that she lived alone. I had never seen such an empty look of hope. I was wondering where she lived so I could visit her one day and we could talk better. Put some color in her life.
Heh! Calm down Wagner. I'm sure she'll soon look for you to thank you for everything you've done for her. Okay?
Wagner was a little confused to hear that and then look at Vinny.
Wait... Are you trying to tell me that-that she's alive?
Vinny was a little surprised by Wagner's reaction, so she just answered.
W-well... I have my words, I have no idea how she is now, but at least she must be alive and thinking of a way to thank you for everything I think. By the way you helped her at a critical moment.
Vinny was trying to look at everyone, but him was interrupted by Wagner.
N-no! If you've seen her and you're here... I have high hopes that she's alive!
Everyone looked very curiously at Vinny and Wagner while Rayane was quiet.
He-hey! Calm down, I don't know if we're talking about the same pegasus, you don't even know her name, but I know, my intuition is never wrong. I-I know you will find she or she will find you.
Vinny looked at Wagner, and only hugged him a little for him to feel calmer.
Everything will be fine, everything in its time. We will all support you. Alright?
Wagner just went to cry slowly, and hugged back.
Yes. I hope everything will be okay. I..I'm okay.
Then Jeff slowly approached Wagner and put the hoof on his shoulder.
Wagner... I think we'd all go to bed now. It's getting too late. I'm sure that tomorrow we'll be able to start talking about her better.
Yes, you're also right. This rain... this storm, it could be that it's letting me down too.
Yes, tomorrow will be a new day, and we will have new air.
Ye-yes. Good night to all of you.

Vinny then smiled when him saw Wagner was going with Jeff back to the group, for finally everyone prepares to go to sleep. Vinny was then a little surprised to see that his mattress was on the side of Rayane's mattress. Rayane laughed a little before answering Vinny.
What a coincidence. I had already asked you to put your mattress next to mine in case you wanted to say something to me before we fell asleep~
Heh! Will I be in the middle again? James and Rayane and me in the middle of everyone?
Shhhhh~ Ivy is quiet on the mattress next to James so in case she wakes up, she doesn't feel insecure about being surrounded by ponies. Let's be we three together next to Ivy.
Vinny was still a little surprised before answering.
But... But... I was going to throw a mattress at James. Ah! Wake me up before he does? Okay?
Vinny then gets a little sad before him continued to answer.
Well is there anything you want to talk to me before bed?
Heh. I always wake up early. But I'll have to wake you up my way~
Rayane started to prepare the mattress stuff to sleep while she answered and lay on this.

I thought you wanted to say something more to me after our conversation at the entrance to the tent. But if you're happy with the information, that's fine. I'm already more than exhausted after this very turbulent night. We were from start to end just solving problems today.
Rayane was then covered in the blanket.
Heh! It's much better to wake up with Rayane doing pranks than waking up with my mouth on a horn again.
James does a facehoof and only covered himself in the blanket to try to sleep at peace. Rayane laughed softly in response.
Silly~
Rayane keep looking at the shadow of the storm while thinking about something. Then Rayane seemed to have remembered something.

I almost forgot to warn you... Rain also has the power to control the weather. Storms don't usually last that long. She always summons this storm when she wants everyone to stop everything they're doing without even realizing it. It's a little tip useful to you in the future.
Rayane was getting ready to close her eyes slowly. Vinny was then a little curious about the information.
W-wow! Nice to know. Well that's. See you later. Be careful not to dream about me again and keep talking in your sleep, everyone will hear you talking while you sleep.
Vinny giggles a little as he closed his eyes.
Heh~ You're already a dream~ Good night Vinny.

Rayane does a little emotional smile as she levitated the Hiroshi amulet next to her chest to feel safer with the memories of the past as she close her eyes. Vinny just smiled and handed the hoof to Rayane as the two finally started sleeping.
